description:
Rei runs astray a little bit, but gets right back on track.  Can he bear the cold jokes from his latest opponent, Tsujii, and emerge victorious?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sur la rive opposée / La rivière noire - 1
Taigan no Aru Mono / Kuroi Kawa 1
What Lies on the Opposite Shore / Black River (Part 1)
ما يقبع على الضفة المقابلة / النهر الأسود (الجزء 1)
対岸にあるもの / 黒い河①
저 멀리 강 건너에 / 검은 강 ①
